dialogue.line: Do not be scared. I'm not here to bust you. I need your help.

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: Anyway, I don't know if you know this, but the sewers in this city are filled with monsters.

dialogue.name: You
dialogue.line: What the hell?! That sounds nasty!

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: Yeah... and you're the only one who can slay them, with your spray paint...

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: Yep... I guess you can see where I'm going with this...

dialogue.name: You
dialogue.line: I don't know, girl... That sounds like a lot of trouble...

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: Pretty pleaasseeeee... Your grafittis are super slay...

dialogue.name: You
dialogue.line: (And I lowkey don't have a life... that could be a fun little side quest...)

dialogue.name: You
dialogue.line: Yeah okay fine! Take me to the monsters!
